definition: to extinguish or put out/to go out (of a fire etc)/to exterminate or wipe out/to drown

sentences.english: Nirvana brings the joy of liberation.
All merits and virtues originate from realizing the Dharma, from which Nirvana dwells.
sentences.chinese: 一切功德皆源自见法，这亦是寂灭之所在。

sentences.english: And the fires also died away.
There he had, so to speak, retreated into himself.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，他在那里已经完全寂灭了。

definition: time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
honored sir (a person of higher status or seniority, or a Buddhist monk)
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
primal chaos/formless mass before creation in Chinese mythology/muddled/innocent as a baby
Nirvana (in Buddhist scripture)/Lord Brahma (the Hindu Creator)
Ceaseless pain (Sanskrit: Avici), one of the Buddhist hells/fig. hell/hell on earth
to spare time for a separate task/doppelgänger/sockpuppet (Internet slang)
